org.openimaj.citation

Class ReferencesClassTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.citation.ReferencesClassTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassTransformer

    public class ReferencesClassTransformer
extends Object
implements ClassTransformer
    ClassTransformer that dynamically augments classes and methods annotated with Reference or References annotations to register the annotations with a global listener if the class is constructed, or the method is invoked.

    When used with the CitationAgent, this can be used to dynamically produce a list of references for code as it is run. Importantly, the list will only contain references for the bits of code that are actually used!

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
